title: inting sion needs to be dealt with.
body:
i just lost a game to that bullshit why is that player literally allowed to run their ass down mid and win the game because of their passive and the fact that they're a tank?
he build full tank and zzrot and just attacked towers constantly it would take atleast 10 seconds to kill him he was so damn tanky and guess what? we had to kill him again. 
was a 4v5 game our xin afk and we held our own really well its just that sion literally carried his entire team with that please do something about this toxic gameplay
make his passive unable to attack structures or something for the love of god.
